net.finmath.marketdata.model.curves

Class AbstractCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.finmath.marketdata.model.curves.AbstractCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, ParameterObjectInterface, CurveInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Curve, DiscountCurveFromForwardCurve

    public abstract class AbstractCurve
extends Object
implements CurveInterface, Cloneable
    Abstract base class for a curve. It stores the name of the curve and provides some convenient way of getting values.
    Author:
    Christian Fries
